title: Inventory
description: Check out MathSoc's board game, novelty, and stationary invetory below!

sections.description: All the MathSoc merch one could ever want, and more.

items.description:
Celebrate your Allegiance to MathSoc with this one of a kind Tee that is totally not a cult fit! 
 Comes in multiple sizes for your wearing pleasure.
Wanna represent Mathsoc while looking gangsta? Look no further.

sections.description:
MathSoc offers all Math students who paid their MathSoc fees access to their library of board games, the largest on campus! 
Math students are free to check out up to 3 games for 2 weeks at a time. 
 Refer to the below to see what's available!
We also sell stationary for your convinience!
